title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 61 - Assessment Corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 61 - Assessment Corporations

State Regulations
§ 61.1 - Modifications of standard fire insurance policy

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 61

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 6609

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
